pageContext.claim: “Patrick Moore, co-founder of Greenpeace: 'The whole climate crisis is not only Fake News, it’s Fake Science. There is no climate crisis, there’s weather and climate all around the world, and in fact carbon dioxide is the main building block of all life.' @foxandfriends  Wow!”
pageContext.analysis: Greenpeace has denied that Moore, who headed Greenpeace Canada for a number of years, is a co-founder of the environmental group: "Patrick Moore frequently portrays himself as a founder or co-founder of Greenpeace, and many news outlets have repeated this characterization. Although Mr. Moore played a significant role in Greenpeace Canada for several years, he did not found Greenpeace. Phil Cotes, Irving Stowe, and Jim Bohlen founded Greenpeace in 1970. Patrick Moore applied for a berth on the Phyllis Cormack in March, 1971 after the organization had already been in existence for a year." The group, which says Moore is a spokesman for the nuclear industry, has posted a copy of the letter.
